name: scholar_search
description: Search for academic papers on Google Scholar. Returns up to 10 results with title, authors, snippet, citation count, year, and URL.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query (e.g. 'machine learning transformers', 'CRISPR gene editing')

steps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('.gs_r.gs_or.gs_scl'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 10); i++) { const el = items[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('.gs_rt a'); const titleFallback = el.querySelector('.gs_rt'); const snippetEl = el.querySelector('.gs_rs'); const authorEl = el.querySelector('.gs_a'); const citedByEl = el.querySelector('.gs_fl a[href*="cites"]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('.gs_rt a'); const pdfEl = el.querySelector('.gs_or_ggsm a, a[href*="pdf"]'); const yearMatch = authorEl ? authorEl.textContent.match(/(\d{4})/) : null; results.push({ title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : (titleFallback ? titleFallback.textContent.trim() : ''), url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '', pdf_url: pdfEl ? pdfEl.href : '', authors_info: authorEl ? authorEl.textContent.trim() : '', year: yearMatch ? yearMatch[1] : '', snippet: snippetEl ? snippetEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 500) : '', cited_by: citedByEl ? citedByEl.textContent.trim() : '' }); } return { query: `{{query}}`, result_count: results.length, results: results }
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract search results
